summary: Highly motivated and seasoned software engineer who is obsessed with improving UX/DX for all. Passionate and dedicated in delivering high-quality results and continuously seeking opportunity for growth.

responsibilities: Optimized Redis cache to reduce requests by 89x which resulted in 70% reduction in Redis server cost and improved overall site request latencies.

Lead developer responsible for coordinating with stakeholders to fully migrate the BigCommerce developer center to NextJS with ISR/SSR which resulted in significant cost reduction, 1.5x improvements on performance metrics, and decreased build time by 2x.
Streamlined the docs deployment toolchain, reducing friction for the documentation team.
Worked on multiple interactive landing pages while coordinating with the design team for best practices to improve developer experiences.

Coordinated across teams to frictionlessly migrate some applications built with ColdFusion to ReactJS and REST APIs, reducing unnecessary overhead. This resulted in improved overall site performance which significantly reduced first contentful paint (FCP).
Implemented a new API for the member portal using NodeJS and Express.
Optimized frontends to efficiently render large datasets by virtualizing tables and parallel processing data per requests, achieving 10x improvement on page load and improved REST APIs response time.
Worked on reducing REST APIs usage abuse by utilizing AWS gateway to handle throttling and rate limiting.
Worked on migrating legacy Objective-C modules to Swift
Worked on optimizing bulk imports that processes millions of active users daily by refactoring preprocessing scripts
Worked on manual testing with PostgreSQL and an e-commerce web application powered by Siebel CRM to ensure data integrity
Coordinated several bi-weekly UAT with clients to ensure project requirements were met.
